name: Drowzee

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Confused.

flavorText: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams. LV. 12 #96

strengths: 50 HP provides good survivability for a Basic Pokemon
Pound requires only 1 Colorless energy, allowing quick attacks with any energy type
Confuse Ray can disrupt opponent's strategy with confusion
Low retreat cost of 1 provides decent mobility
Confusion can cause opponent to damage themselves
Evolves into Hypno for more powerful sleep-inducing abilities
weaknesses: Confuse Ray only deals 10 damage, which is quite low for 2 energy
Confusion effect is unreliable (50% chance on coin flip)
Both attacks deal minimal damage compared to other Basics
synergies: Gust of Wind can keep confused Pokemon trapped in the Active position
Defender reduces damage while you apply confusion pressure
PlusPower boosts both attacks by 10 damage
Switch allows you to pivot after applying confusion
counters: Full Heal or Switch to remove confusion
High damage attackers that can knockout before confusion matters
